name: Gamelan Hit VR Rindik
description:
Playing traditional music(Bali Music Instrumental) must be fun and feel excited. But have you ever feel playing traditional music in virtual reality (VR)? Introducing our games "Gamelan Hit Rindik" from our studio Rapid Raid Games that gives an experience playing Bali traditional music in VR. In Gamelan Hit Rindik VR you will provided our video and tutorial about how to play for beginner. With "panggul" as a hit tool, feel free to create your own traditional song or you can learn a rindik song from it!

#Video Gameplay : 

#VR Devices Support:

Oculus Rift Support /Oculus Link

#Release Date on Oculus Store July 31, 2020

#Oculus Store Link : https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2874821582600669/
